channel.title: Salem - VPS Hosted "we're back"! -Dungeonaring- -Construction- 24/7 UPTIME!
channel.description:
[center][size=20pt]SALEM[/size][/center]
[center]Salem - 24/7 Uptime, Dungeoneering, Construction, Pking, Fully Working Switching, Turmoil.[/center]
Website [url=http://salemps.com]www.Salemps.com[/url]
Forum [url=http://salemps.enjin.com/home]www.Salemps.enjin.com[/url]
[size=10pt]Download[/size] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybj4ysxtof2nq3g/Salem.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/ybj4ysxtof2nq3g/Salem.jar?dl=1[/url]
We're back guys!
All dupes and bugs have been fixed :D
server just fresh out today vps hosted looking for more players to come along and join!
This server has been an on going projects over the last 6 months!
[b][size=14pt]Salem is a 317 server loading higher data, we mix our revisions of maps and items. At Salem even the smallest bug is important and we are able to say we update more than most of the other servers out there. Our staff team at Salem comes with alot of experience and are always looking to help. We are here to succeed and make Salem 1 of the best servers there are, you could even make a friend or two. [/size][/b]
[size=10pt]Features[/size] * 100% Uptime * Daily Updates * Dungeoneering * Dwarf Milticannon * Full Summoning Skills * Complete Clan Chat * Full Pking * Flawless Combat * Jad * F2P Arena * Active Community Forum * Bossing * Loyalty Points * Friendly and Active Staff * Custom Shops * Multiple Point Systems * Nex * Guilded Altars * Crystal Key Chest * Barrows * Pest Control * World 2 (COMING SOON)
[size=10pt]Pictures[/size]
Working Vote Point Store [img]http://i.gyazo.com/39db6facada109d2e36a3772db93db1c.png[/img]
Working Vote Point System [img]http://i.gyazo.com/fb1daa33c00d2913835c8665d82861f6.png[/img]
All Special Attacks Work Flawlessly [img]http://i.imgur.com/pNLqPPB.png[/img]
Working Comp and Max Cape [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f3de683e6ec21193ca2e9f71196e87f6.png[/img]
Bork Custom Boss added [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e692955631bbc584bfe34ae738b2bd2d.png[/img]
All Working Skills Including Dungeonaring and Construction [img]http://i.gyazo.com/3a2dc4c88d4167c40bcf6e6cfd164d7c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2788074ecab769447076d6cf21f0a6aa.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/8d476072a884e9b3f29e87d1bbaf1cb6.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/A2alrYb.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4lrq3aS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1G1kfDB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZYM9WaI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/TfCbnQK.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LQbO7WT.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b8dbc3bfaf1b5fc1ceefffed58bda36d.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/u4FtqVZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xR8lco2.png[/img]
Things we're working on -
Adding a "weapons mini game" Buying and developing a much better forums

item.title: Salem - VPS Hosted "we're back"! -Dungeonaring- -Construction- 24/7 UPTIME!
item.dc:creator: @paulvereline paulvereline
item.description:
@paulvereline wrote:

[quote=“SalemRSPS, post:8, topic:551902”][quote author=beale link=topic=670817.msg4487130#msg4487130 date=1434851812]
Not even gunna sugar coat… sorry for the gravedig somewhat, but this server is terrible. Not even worth the log in… Typical deathly Pvpz leech, just a couple things modified/added. No cheat client protection, so when i logged in and notified owner, he ip banned me and persued to DDOS me… Staff is terrible from what i can see. Anyone that reads this, I would suggest not even giving a look towards this server. Not worth the waste of time. Thank you.
[/quote]

Ignore this post, the owners for this server used to help this individual code his servers doing simple things like changing ip etc, when we stopped helping and started working on our own server he got aggravated and now he has come on our server demanding staff, we refused him and he has come on here to post this. We did not DDOS him but I will admit that he was ip-banned because of his attitude towards the staff and other players.[/quote]I love how big of a lie this post is. I was there and he did not beg for staff. Beale found a little bug in the system and went to go report it and as soon as he did he got ip banned. So with the use of his vpn he logged back in to ask why he got banned and the owner Luke began to start ddosing Beale and I. Horrible server with horrible staff. Many bugs in the system and its nothing but a leech anyways. I do not suggest playing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Salem - VPS Hosted "we're back"! -Dungeonaring- -Construction- 24/7 UPTIME!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

The server is your typical Non-unique, PI leech loading higher revision data. You have a donor shop with OP items which makes me think that you are only interested in making a quick buck. Also Your “vote4cash” rewards are also OP. You shouldn’t have to make people to vote, they should be voting willingly because your server is good. This also makes me think that you do not have any hope for your own server and have to rely on OP rewards to get your players to continue playing.

Also, you seem like a bad owner as you cannot take criticism, you cannot control your emotions and you ban people for telling you flaws. I bet the “skyrahh” account is yours and you’re using it to bump your thread.

Conclusion: looks bad, owner seems bad, would definitely not play

Read full topic
